title: [Sponsor] Clerk — Complete User Management for Your iOS Application
content:
Integrate authentication and user management services with applications made for the Apple ecosystem with Clerk’s iOS SDK. Built with Swift, the SDK adheres to modern standards, delivering the idiomatic and consistent developer experience you expect from Clerk. Our iOS SDK makes use of the latest in Swift networking, allowing your code to be as readable and expressive as possible. Authenticate with your favorite social providers in just a few lines of code. Let the iOS SDK take care of managing your users’ authentication state so you can get back to building your app.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
